ingredients.ingredient: 4 bone-in chicken breast halves with skin

cookingTips: Pat chicken skin dry before oiling to promote browning and crispiness
Position broiler rack 6-8 inches from heat source and preheat thoroughly
Cook for 12-15 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165Â°F at thickest point
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user to achieve crispy skin and juicy meat by properly drying the chicken and monitoring internal temperature with a thermometer.
